mr.core

Interface JobTracker

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobTrackerImpl

    public interface JobTracker
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    Remote Interface for JobTracker
    Author:
    Yanan Jian, Erdong Li

        java.lang.String selfPort,

          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Init JobTracker, create mrRegistry
        Parameters:
        registryHost - mapreducefm's Registry host address
        mrPort - mapreducefm's registry port number
        dfsPort - dfs's port number
        selfPort - mapreducefm's port number
        reducer_ct - reducer numbers customized by client
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
